message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, I'm willing to negotiate!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but still a good one!
You're getting desperate, I'll take a smaller share now!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you're still getting the majority!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a bit more, but you're still getting most of it!
I'm not budging, take the scraps!
I'll give you the minimum, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're almost out of time, take it or I'll leave you with nothing!
I'll give you the last crumbs, but I'm not going down without a fight!
No deal, I'll take it all!
